summary: Religious tracking app with an 'Oruç Takibi' (fasting) section, now adding a new 'Namaz Takibi' (prayer tracking) tab for daily prayers and make-up (kaza) prayer tracking.
architectural_notes: Implement 'Namaz Takibi' as a separate tab/section, parallel to existing 'Oruç Takibi' tab.

existing_features.title: Add a new top-level tab called “Namaz Takibi” (Prayer Tracking) similar in structure to the existing “Oruç Takibi” tab, and make it reachable from the tab navigation (including the overflow menu).

Implement the “Daily Prayers” section in the new Namaz Takibi tab: show a checklist for the 5 daily prayers (Fajr/Sabah, Dhuhr/Öğle, Asr/İkindi, Maghrib/Akşam, Isha/Yatsı) that the user can mark as completed for the current day.
Implement the “Kaza (Make-up) Prayers” section in the new Namaz Takibi tab: allow the user to track make-up prayer counts per prayer type and reduce those counts as make-up prayers are performed.
Extend the local settings model and storage migration to persist Namaz Takibi data (daily checklist by date + kaza counts).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add 'Namaz Takibi' tab similar to 'Oruç Takibi' with daily prayer checklist (Sabah/Öğle/İkindi/Akşam/Yatsı) and kaza prayer counters that can be reduced as completed.

projectName: Add 'Namaz Takibi' tab with daily prayer checklist and make-up (kaza) counters
